# cograph

**cograph** is a modern R package for network visualization. It renders
publication-ready network plots from adjacency matrices, edge lists,
igraph, statnet network, qgraph, or tna objects using a pipe-friendly
API with full control over nodes, edges, layouts, and themes.

Key features:

- **Base R and grid rendering** via
  [`splot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/splot.md) and
  [`soplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/soplot.md)
- **Pipe-friendly API**:
  `cograph() |> sn_nodes() |> sn_edges() |> sn_theme()`
- **12+ node shapes** including pie charts and donut rings
- **7 built-in themes** and multiple color palettes
- **Confidence interval underlays**, edge label templates, weight
  scaling
- **Converters** for `tna` and `qgraph` objects

## Installation

``` r
# Install from CRAN (when available)
install.packages("cograph")

# Or install the development version from GitHub
# install.packages("devtools")
#devtools::install_github("sonsoleslp/cograph")
```

## Quick Start

``` r
library(cograph)
#> cograph: Modern Network Visualization for R
#> Version: 1.5.2
#> Type ?cograph for help

# 10-node directed transition matrix (TNA-style)
set.seed(42)
states <- c("Explore", "Plan", "Monitor", "Evaluate", "Adapt",
            "Reflect", "Regulate", "Execute", "Collaborate", "Review")
mat <- matrix(runif(100, 0, 0.3), nrow = 10, dimnames = list(states, states))
diag(mat) <- 0
mat <- mat / rowSums(mat)  # row-normalize

# Basic plot
splot(mat)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-3-1.png)

``` r

# Pipe-chain style
cograph(mat, layout = "spring") |>
  sn_nodes(size = 0.07, fill = "steelblue", shape = "circle") |>
  sn_edges(width = "weight", color = "weight") |>
  sn_theme("minimal") |>
  sn_render()
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-3-2.png)

## Input Formats

cograph accepts six input types:

``` r
# 1. Adjacency matrix
adj <- matrix(c(0,1,1, 1,0,1, 1,1,0), nrow = 3)
splot(adj)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-1.png)

``` r

# 2. Edge list (data.frame with from, to, and optional weight)
edges <- data.frame(
  from = c("A", "A", "B"),
  to   = c("B", "C", "C"),
  weight = c(0.8, 0.5, 0.3)
)
splot(edges)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-2.png)

``` r

# 3. igraph object
library(igraph)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'igraph'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:cograph':
#> 
#>     is_directed
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     decompose, spectrum
#> The following object is masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     union
g <- make_ring(10)
splot(g)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-3.png)

``` r

# 4. statnet network object
library(network)
#> 
#> 'network' 1.19.0 (2024-12-08), part of the Statnet Project
#> * 'news(package="network")' for changes since last version
#> * 'citation("network")' for citation information
#> * 'https://statnet.org' for help, support, and other information
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'network'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:igraph':
#> 
#>     %c%, %s%, add.edges, add.vertices, delete.edges, delete.vertices,
#>     get.edge.attribute, get.edges, get.vertex.attribute, is.bipartite,
#>     is.directed, list.edge.attributes, list.vertex.attributes,
#>     set.edge.attribute, set.vertex.attribute
net <- network.initialize(5, directed = FALSE)
net[1,2] <- net[2,3] <- net[3,4] <- net[4,5] <- net[1,5] <- 1
splot(net)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-4.png)

``` r

# 5. qgraph object
library(qgraph)
q <- qgraph(adj)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-5.png)

``` r
splot(q)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-6.png)

``` r

# 6. tna object (transition network analysis)
library(tna)
#> 'tna' package version 1.1.0
#> ------------------------------------------------------
#>   Tikka, S., LÃ³pez-Pernas, S., and Saqr, M. (2025). 
#>   tna: An R Package for Transition Network Analysis.
#>   Applied Psychological Measurement.
#>   https://doi.org/10.1177/01466216251348840
#> ------------------------------------------------------
#> Please type 'citation("tna")' for more citation information.
#> See the package website at https://sonsoles.me/tna/
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'tna'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:igraph':
#> 
#>     cliques, communities, compare
tna_obj <- tna(group_regulation)
splot(tna_obj)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-7.png)

## splot() vs soplot()

[`splot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/splot.md) uses base R
graphics; [`soplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/soplot.md)
uses grid graphics. Both accept the same parameters.

``` r
# Base R (recommended for knitting and file output)
splot(mat, layout = "circle", theme = "classic")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-5-1.png)

``` r

# Grid-based (useful for sn_ggplot())
soplot(mat, layout = "circle", theme = "classic")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-5-2.png)

## Layouts

``` r
# Built-in layouts
splot(mat, layout = "circle")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-1.png)

``` r
splot(mat, layout = "spring")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-2.png)

``` r

# Group-based layout
groups <- rep(1:3, length.out = 10)
cograph(mat) |> sn_layout("groups", groups = groups) |> sn_render()
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-3.png)

``` r

# igraph layout codes
splot(mat, layout = "kk")    # Kamada-Kawai
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-4.png)

``` r
splot(mat, layout = "fr")    # Fruchterman-Reingold
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-5.png)

``` r
splot(mat, layout = "mds")   # Multidimensional scaling
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-6.png)

``` r

# Custom coordinates
coords <- matrix(runif(20), ncol = 2)
cograph(mat) |> sn_layout(coords) |> sn_render()
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-6-7.png)

## Node Shapes

All available shapes:

``` r
# Shapes: circle, square, triangle, diamond, pentagon, hexagon,
#         ellipse, heart, star, cross, rectangle

# One shape per node
shapes <- c("circle", "square", "triangle", "diamond", "pentagon",
            "hexagon", "ellipse", "heart", "star", "cross")
splot(mat, node_shape = shapes, node_fill = palette_rainbow(10), layout = "circle")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-7-1.png)

## Node Aesthetics

``` r
splot(mat,
  node_size = seq(0.04, 0.08, length.out = 10),
  node_fill = palette_pastel(10),
  node_border_color = "gray30",
  node_border_width = 2,
  node_alpha = 0.85,
  label_size = 9,
  label_color = "black",
  label_position = "center"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-8-1.png)

## Edge Aesthetics

``` r
# Width, color, and style
splot(mat,
  positive_color = "#2E7D32",
  negative_color = "#C62828",
  edge_style = "solid",
  curvature = 0.2,
  arrow_size = 0.015
)
#> Warning: 'positive_color' is deprecated, use 'edge_positive_color' instead.
#> Warning: 'negative_color' is deprecated, use 'edge_negative_color' instead.
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-9-1.png)

## Confidence Intervals and P-Values

cograph supports statistical edge visualization with CI underlays and
significance notation.

``` r
# Confidence interval underlays (uncertainty bands)
splot(mat,
  edge_ci = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0.05, 0.2),
  edge_ci_alpha = 0.15,
  edge_ci_scale = 2.5,
  edge_ci_style = 1  # 1=solid, 2=dashed, 3=dotted
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-10-1.png)

``` r

# P-values with significance stars (*** p<0.001, ** p<0.01, * p<0.05)
splot(mat,
  edge_labels = TRUE,
  edge_label_p = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0, 0.1),
  edge_label_stars = TRUE,
  edge_label_size = 0.5
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-10-2.png)

``` r

# Custom template with CI bounds
splot(mat,
  edge_label_template = "{est}{stars}\n[{low}, {up}]",
  edge_ci_lower = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0.1, 0.3),
  edge_ci_upper = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0.4, 0.6),
  edge_label_p = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0, 0.1),
  edge_label_stars = TRUE,
  edge_label_digits = 2,
  edge_label_size = 0.45
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-10-3.png)

``` r

# Publication-ready with CI underlays and labels
splot(mat,
  edge_ci = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0.05, 0.2),
  edge_ci_alpha = 0.12,
  edge_label_template = "{est}{stars}",
  edge_label_p = runif(sum(mat > 0), 0, 0.1),
  edge_label_stars = TRUE,
  edge_label_size = 0.5,
  theme = "minimal"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-10-4.png)

Template placeholders: `{est}`, `{low}`, `{up}`, `{range}`, `{p}`,
[stars](https://r-spatial.github.io/stars/)

## Pie Chart Nodes

``` r
set.seed(1)
# Each node gets a vector of pie segment values
pie_vals <- lapply(1:10, function(i) runif(4))
pie_cols <- c("#E41A1C", "#377EB8", "#4DAF4A", "#FF7F00")

splot(mat,
  node_shape = "pie",
  pie_values = pie_vals,
  pie_colors = pie_cols,
  layout = "circle"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-11-1.png)

``` r

# Per-node color palettes
pie_cols_multi <- list(
  c("#E63946", "#F1FAEE", "#A8DADC"),
  c("#264653", "#2A9D8F", "#E9C46A"),
  c("#F72585", "#7209B7", "#3A0CA3"),
  c("#003049", "#D62828", "#F77F00"),
  c("#606C38", "#283618", "#DDA15E"),
  c("#0077B6", "#00B4D8", "#90E0EF"),
  c("#9B2226", "#AE2012", "#BB3E03"),
  c("#023047", "#219EBC", "#8ECAE6"),
  c("#5F0F40", "#9A031E", "#FB8B24"),
  c("#2D00F7", "#6A00F4", "#8900F2")
)
splot(mat,
  node_shape = "pie",
  pie_values = lapply(1:10, function(i) runif(3)),
  pie_colors = pie_cols_multi,
  node_size = 6,
  layout = "circle"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-11-2.png)

## Donut Nodes

``` r
# Simple donut: fill proportion per node (0 to 1)
fills <- runif(10, 0.3, 0.95)
splot(mat,
  node_shape = "donut",
  donut_fill = fills,
  donut_color = "steelblue",
  layout = "circle"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-1.png)

``` r

# Segmented donuts with multiple colors
donut_vals <- lapply(1:10, function(i) runif(3))
donut_cols <- list(c("#E63946", "#457B9D", "#2A9D8F"))
splot(mat,
  donut_values = donut_vals,
  donut_colors = donut_cols,
  donut_inner_ratio = 0.6,
  node_size = 6
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-2.png)

``` r

# Per-node donut color palettes
donut_cols_multi <- list(
  c("#003049", "#D62828", "#F77F00", "#FCBF49"),
  c("#606C38", "#283618", "#DDA15E", "#BC6C25"),
  c("#0077B6", "#00B4D8", "#90E0EF", "#CAF0F8"),
  c("#9B2226", "#AE2012", "#BB3E03", "#CA6702"),
  c("#5F0F40", "#9A031E", "#FB8B24", "#E36414"),
  c("#023047", "#219EBC", "#8ECAE6", "#FFB703"),
  c("#264653", "#2A9D8F", "#E9C46A", "#F4A261"),
  c("#F72585", "#B5179E", "#7209B7", "#560BAD"),
  c("#10002B", "#240046", "#3C096C", "#5A189A"),
  c("#D8F3DC", "#B7E4C7", "#95D5B2", "#74C69D")
)
splot(mat,
  donut_values = lapply(1:10, function(i) runif(4)),
  donut_colors = donut_cols_multi,
  donut_inner_ratio = 0.55,
  node_size = 6
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-3.png)

``` r

# Polygon donut shapes
splot(mat,
  node_shape = "donut",
  donut_fill = fills,
  donut_shape = c("circle", "hexagon", "square", "diamond", "triangle",
                  "pentagon", "circle", "hexagon", "square", "diamond"),
  donut_color = palette_viridis(10)
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-4.png)

``` r

# Show value in center
splot(mat,
  node_shape = "donut",
  donut_fill = fills,
  donut_show_value = TRUE,
  donut_value_digits = 0,
  donut_value_suffix = "%"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-5.png)

``` r

# Donut + Pie combo: outer donut ring with inner pie segments
splot(mat,
  node_shape = "donut",
  donut_fill = fills,
  donut_color = "steelblue",
  pie_values = lapply(1:10, function(i) runif(3)),
  pie_colors = c("#E41A1C", "#377EB8", "#4DAF4A")
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-6.png)

``` r

# Double donut: two concentric rings
splot(mat,
  node_shape = "donut",
  donut_fill = fills,
  donut_color = "steelblue",
  donut2_values = runif(10, 0.2, 0.8),
  donut2_colors = "coral"
)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-12-7.png)

## Weight Handling

``` r
# Round weights to 1 digit
splot(mat, weight_digits = 1)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-13-1.png)

``` r

# Filter edges below threshold
splot(mat, threshold = 0.1)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-13-2.png)

``` r

# Set maximum for scaling
splot(mat, maximum = 1.0)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-13-3.png)

``` r

# Disable two-tier cutoff
splot(mat, cut = 0)
#> Warning: 'cut' is deprecated, use 'edge_cutoff' instead.
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-13-4.png)

``` r

# Logarithmic edge scaling
splot(mat, edge_scale_mode = "log")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-13-5.png)

## Themes

Seven built-in themes:

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "classic")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-1.png)

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "dark")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-2.png)

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "colorblind")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-3.png)

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "gray")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-4.png)

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "minimal")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-5.png)

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "viridis")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-6.png)

``` r
splot(mat, theme = "nature")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-14-7.png)

## Color Palettes

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_rainbow(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-1.png)

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_colorblind(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-2.png)

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_pastel(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-3.png)

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_viridis(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-4.png)

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_blues(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-5.png)

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_reds(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-6.png)

``` r
splot(mat, node_fill = palette_diverging(10))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-15-7.png)

## Converters: from_tna() and from_qgraph()

``` r
# Convert a tna object (requires tna package)
library(tna)
tna_obj <- tna(group_regulation)
from_tna(tna_obj)
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-16-1.png)

``` r

# Override parameters during conversion
from_tna(tna_obj, theme = "dark", layout = "circle")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-16-2.png)

## ggplot2 Integration

``` r
library(ggplot2)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'ggplot2'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:cograph':
#> 
#>     get_theme

p <- cograph(mat) |>
  sn_nodes(fill = "steelblue") |>
  sn_theme("minimal") |>
  sn_ggplot()

p + labs(title = "My Network") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-17-1.png)

## Saving Plots

``` r
net <- cograph(mat) |>
  sn_nodes(fill = palette_pastel(10)) |>
  sn_theme("minimal")

sn_save(net, "network.pdf", width = 8, height = 8)
sn_save(net, "network.png", width = 8, height = 8, dpi = 300)
sn_save(net, "network.svg", width = 8, height = 8)
```

## Function Reference

| Function                                                               | Purpose                                                                |
|------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [`cograph()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/cograph.md)         | Create network from matrix, edge list, igraph, network, qgraph, or tna |
| [`splot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/splot.md)             | Render with base R graphics                                            |
| [`soplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/soplot.md)           | Render with grid graphics                                              |
| [`sn_nodes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_nodes.md)       | Set node aesthetics                                                    |
| [`sn_edges()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_edges.md)       | Set edge aesthetics                                                    |
| [`sn_layout()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_layout.md)     | Apply layout algorithm                                                 |
| [`sn_theme()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_theme.md)       | Apply visual theme                                                     |
| [`sn_palette()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_palette.md)   | Apply color palette                                                    |
| [`sn_render()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/soplot.md)        | Render to current device                                               |
| [`sn_ggplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_ggplot.md)     | Convert to ggplot2 object                                              |
| [`sn_save()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_save.md)         | Save to file                                                           |
| [`from_tna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/from_tna.md)       | Convert tna object                                                     |
| [`from_qgraph()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/from_qgraph.md) | Convert qgraph object                                                  |

## License

MIT License. See [LICENSE](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/LICENSE) for
details.

# Package index

## Network functions

- [`cograph()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/cograph.md) :
  Create a Network Visualization
- [`as_cograph()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/as_cograph.md) :
  Convert to Cograph Network
- [`n_nodes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/n_nodes.md) : Get
  Number of Nodes
- [`n_edges()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/n_edges.md) : Get
  Number of Edges
- [`get_edges()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/get_edges.md) :
  Get Edges from Cograph Network
- [`get_labels()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/get_labels.md) :
  Get Labels from Cograph Network
- [`get_nodes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/get_nodes.md) :
  Get Nodes from Cograph Network
- [`set_edges()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/set_edges.md) :
  Set Edges in Cograph Network
- [`set_nodes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/set_nodes.md) :
  Set Nodes in Cograph Network
- [`sn_edges()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_edges.md) : Set
  Edge Aesthetics
- [`sn_ggplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_ggplot.md) :
  Convert Network to ggplot2
- [`sn_nodes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_nodes.md) : Set
  Node Aesthetics
- [`sn_save()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_save.md) : Save
  Network Visualization
- [`aes-nodes`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/aes-nodes.md) :
  Node Aesthetics
- [`aes-edges`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/aes-edges.md) :
  Edge Aesthetics
- [`output-save`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/output-save.md) :
  Output and Saving
- [`from_qgraph()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/from_qgraph.md)
  : Convert a qgraph object to cograph parameters

## Base R plotting

- [`splot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/splot.md) : Base R
  Graphics Network Plotting
- [`sn_save()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_save.md) : Save
  Network Visualization

## Plotting based on `ggplot2`

- [`soplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/soplot.md)
  [`sn_render()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/soplot.md) : Plot
  Cograph Network
- [`sn_ggplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_ggplot.md) :
  Convert Network to ggplot2
- [`sn_save_ggplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_save_ggplot.md)
  : Save as ggplot2

## Transition Network Analysis

- [`from_tna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/from_tna.md) :
  Convert a tna object to cograph parameters
- [`plot_tna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_tna.md)
  [`tplot()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_tna.md) :
  TNA-Style Network Plot (qgraph Compatible)
- [`plot_htna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_htna.md) :
  Plot Heterogeneous TNA Network (Multi-Group Layout)

## Multi-Cluster TNA Network Plot

- [`plot_mtna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_mtna.md)
  [`mtna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_mtna.md) :
  Multi-Cluster TNA Network Plot

## Multilevel Network Visualization

- [`plot_mlna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_mlna.md)
  [`mlna()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/plot_mlna.md) :
  Multilevel Network Visualization

## Palettes

- [`list_palettes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/list_palettes.md)
  : List Available Color Palettes
- [`sn_palette()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_palette.md) :
  Apply Color Palette to Network
- [`palette_blues()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_blues.md)
  : Blues Palette
- [`palette_colorblind()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_colorblind.md)
  : Colorblind-friendly Palette
- [`palette_diverging()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_diverging.md)
  : Diverging Palette
- [`palette_pastel()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_pastel.md)
  : Pastel Palette
- [`palette_rainbow()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_rainbow.md)
  : Rainbow Palette
- [`palette_reds()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_reds.md)
  : Reds Palette
- [`palette_viridis()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palette_viridis.md)
  : Viridis Palette
- [`palettes`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/palettes.md) : Color
  Palettes

## Shapes

- [`get_shape()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/get_shape.md) :
  Get a Registered Shape
- [`list_shapes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/list_shapes.md)
  : List Available Shapes
- [`list_svg_shapes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/list_svg_shapes.md)
  : List Registered SVG Shapes
- [`register_shape()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/register_shape.md)
  : Register a Custom Shape
- [`register_svg_shape()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/register_svg_shape.md)
  : Register Custom SVG Shape
- [`unregister_svg_shape()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/unregister_svg_shape.md)
  : Unregister SVG Shape

## Themes

- [`get_theme()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/get_theme.md) :
  Get a Registered Theme
- [`list_themes()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/list_themes.md)
  : List Available Themes
- [`sn_theme()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_theme.md) :
  Apply Theme to Network
- [`register_theme()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/register_theme.md)
  : Register a Custom Theme
- [`theme_cograph_classic()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_classic.md)
  : Classic Theme
- [`theme_cograph_colorblind()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_colorblind.md)
  : Colorblind-friendly Theme
- [`theme_cograph_dark()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_dark.md)
  : Dark Theme
- [`theme_cograph_gray()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_gray.md)
  : Grayscale Theme
- [`theme_cograph_minimal()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_minimal.md)
  : Minimal Theme
- [`theme_cograph_nature()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_nature.md)
  : Nature Theme
- [`theme_cograph_viridis()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/theme_cograph_viridis.md)
  : Viridis Theme

## Layouts

- [`get_layout()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/get_layout.md) :
  Get a Registered Layout
- [`set_layout()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/set_layout.md) :
  Set Layout in Cograph Network
- [`sn_layout()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/sn_layout.md) :
  Apply Layout to Network
- [`layout-circle`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout-circle.md)
  : Circular Layout
- [`layout-groups`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout-groups.md)
  : Group-based Layout
- [`layout-oval`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout-oval.md) :
  Oval/Ellipse Layout
- [`layout-spring`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout-spring.md)
  : Fruchterman-Reingold Spring Layout
- [`layout_circle()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout_circle.md)
  : Circular Layout
- [`layout_groups()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout_groups.md)
  : Group-based Layout
- [`layout_oval()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout_oval.md)
  : Oval Layout
- [`layout_spring()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/layout_spring.md)
  : Fruchterman-Reingold Spring Layout
- [`list_layouts()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/list_layouts.md)
  : List Available Layouts
- [`register_layout()`](http://sonsoles.me/cograph/reference/register_layout.md)
  : Register a Custom Layout
